summary: A little mod that adds a whole lot of immersion into the game. Answering many a question that I and I hope many more have had for a while.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8092/8582926676_1069ed7043.jpg[/img]

 !!! Update Coming Around The 31st Of March (Relative to English time) And I Will Be fixing all problems and concerns you have !!!

       [b]An Immersive Medical Mod for Skyrim[/b]

[b]Overview[/b]

Have you every downed a healing potion or used a spell and thought \"Why do the Nords hate magic yet like potions and restoration magic.\" Or \"surely at this day and age the use of medical herbs would be more popular around the land of Skyrim.\" Maybe you have said \"Why are soldiers the only ones who use bandages.\"

If any of these have ever passed your thoughts then like me, you are disappointed at the lack of alternative ways to heal yourself. That is why I opened up the creation kit and added these brand new bandage recipes to the tanning rack.

[b]Short Overview[/b]

Dunlewd deis mud!

Get new healy things!

[b]Installation[/b]

    [b]MANUAL[/b] Not Recommended
1. Download manually
2. Unpack with an archive extractor.
3. Drag \"meshes\" into the \"Data\" folder in your Skyrim game files.
4. Launch Skyrim
5. If there is no crash on start-up or game load then you have
installed it correctly. If not then you have done something
wrong.

[b]OR[/b]

[b]Nexus Mod Manager[/b] Recommended
1. Download with Nexus Mod Manager
2. Once the download has finished click the install button.
3. Once the successful installation message pops up, close
Mod Manager and launch Skyrim. There should be no
problems. If so then it may be your mod manager.

[b]Credits[/b]

Bethesda : Stock mesh for the bandages
KWorld : Adding the new bandages

[b]To-do List[/b]

1. Add Medical Herbs.
2. Add More Bandages.
3. Make a \"Medical\" Tab In Crafting.
4. Add Medical Vendors
5. Add Bandages Into Trader Stores.

[b]Announcement[/b]

I\'m looking for someone who is good at making textures and meshes. I suppose I could learn how to make meshes and textures but I\'m lazy and that would take too long.

[b]Changelog[/b]

    [b]v0.4A[/b]
First Public Release!
Added Antihistamine Bandages
Added Long Term Bandages
Added Crafting Recipes

[b]How to Aquire Bandages[/b]

Method One:
Go to a tanning rack and under \"Misc\" there will
be bandage crafting recipes.
author: KWorld
